member.summary: The data point for the chart.

member.summary: Gets the numeric value for this data point.

member.summary: Gets or sets the point index for the data point.

member.summary: Gets or sets the underlying business object this data point is bound to.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnimationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the plot points animate one at a time, series by series, or all at once All animation is still completed within duration

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnimationMode.All
member.summary: All points and series are animated at once.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnimationMode.Point
member.summary: Animation is performed point by point. Multiple series are animated simultaneously at the same time.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnimationMode.Series
member.summary: Animation is performed series by series.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPositionType
member.summary: Specifies the position of an axis or legend on the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPositionType.Auto
member.summary: The item appears to the bottom of the chart when there is more vertical space and on the right when there is more horizontal space.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPositionType.None
member.summary: The item is not visible.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPositionType.Left
member.summary: The item appears to the left of the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPositionType.Top
member.summary: The item appears above the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPositionType.Right
member.summary: The item appears to the right of the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPositionType.Bottom
member.summary: The item appears below the chart.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartLegendOrientation
member.summary: Specifies the layout of an legend on the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartLegendOrientation.Vertical
member.summary: The legend should be vertically oriented.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartLegendOrientation.Horizontal
member.summary: The legend should be horizontally oriented.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartLegendOrientation.Auto
member.summary: The legend should be automatically oriented.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationAttachment
member.summary: Specifies the attachment of the annotation.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationAttachment.Absolute
member.summary: The coordinates of the annotation are specified by the annotation's shape data in pixels.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationAttachment.DataCoordinate
member.summary: The annotation coordinates are specified in data coordinates.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationAttachment.DataIndex
member.summary: The annotation coordinates are specified by the data series index and point index.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationAttachment.Relative
member.summary: The annotation coordinates are specified as a relative position within the control where (0,0) is the top left corner and (1,1) is the bottom right corner.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of the annotation.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationPosition.Bottom
member.summary: The annotation appears at the bottom of the target point.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationPosition.Center
member.summary: The annotation appears at the center of the target point.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationPosition.Left
member.summary: The annotation appears to the left of the target point.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationPosition.Right
member.summary: The annotation appears to the right of the target point.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartAnnotationPosition.Top
member.summary: The annotation appears at the top of the target point.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartSelectionModeType
member.summary: Specifies what is selected when the user clicks the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartSelectionModeType.None
member.summary: Select neither series nor data points when the user clicks the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartSelectionModeType.Series
member.summary: Select the whole series when the user clicks it on the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartSelectionModeType.Point
member.summary: Select the data point when the user clicks it on the chart. Since Line, Area, Spline, and SplineArea charts do not render individual data points, nothing is selected with this setting on those chart types.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.ChartCore.ChartPalettes
member.summary: Defines color palettes for chart and pie.
